response_plan: The system prioritizes hospital choices based on capacity and severity of injuries, and selects available ambulances equipped with essential medical supplies to transport victims. Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar is prioritized due to its high bed capacity and diverse specializations, while ambulances are chosen based on availability and equipment.
action_details: Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar is prioritized due to its high bed capacity and diverse specializations, while ambulances are chosen based on availability and equipment.
